SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT MENU_ID, IFNULL(UP_MENU_ID, '') AS UP_MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, IFNULL(SORT_ORDER, '0') AS SORT_ORDER, IF(USE_YN='Y', '사용', '미사용') AS USE_YN, PROGRM_URL, UPDUSR_SN, UPDT_DT, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM IS_MENU, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE MENU_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #srch_menu_id#, '%') AND MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #srch_menu_name#, '%') ) A
WHERE A.RNUM >= #START_ROW# AND A.RNUM <= #END_ROW#
SELECT a.UP_MENU_ID, a.MENU_ID, a.MENU_NAME, a.SORT_ORDER, a.PROGRM_URL, a.USE_YN, a.UPDUSR_SN, a.UPDT_DT FROM IS_MENU a WHERE a.MENU_ID = #menu_id#
